wikipedia_page.main:
Kenneth McKenzie Norrie FRSE is a Scottish legal scholar. He is professor of law at the Strathclyde Law School, where he was formerly head of department.  
He has previously taught at the University of Dundee.  
Professor Norrie is one of the foremost academics in Scots Family Law and Scots Law of Delict and was awarded lecturer of the year of 2007 by The Firm Magazine.

response: Professor Kenneth Norrie was awarded Scottish Law Lecturer of the Year 2007 at the Law Awards of Scotland, and the Law School obtained more nominations than any other law school in 2007, with Professors Norrie, Robson and Rodger being nominated.
* Kenneth Norrie , eminent professor of Scots Family Law and Delict Law, head of department at Warwick University and former chair at King's College London
